results.title: Effect of Metformin on the Functional and Electrophysiological Recovery of Crush Injury-Induced Facial Nerve Paralysis in Diabetic Rats
results.text_hl: In comparison to the PBS group, the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group's recurrence of @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014693 @@@vibrissa fibrillation@@@ occurred noticeably sooner over time.
